author: dapplion
content: Talking with <@545555441518772225> would be good to decide when to cut releases for the beacon-APIs repo. Appartently before releases where cut when clients indicate features to be implemented. I don't think this scales very well, so instead we could release at some milestone similar to consensus specs and then clients are free to indicate what version they support if any.
